Blackfang: Unless they were after you, simply and deadly as it is. 
What is your speciality? Genius technician, like the first Wheeljack?

> Wheeljack-X::
> 
> "Who knows?" Wheeljack-X answers, mystified.  "I mean, I've been to 
a 
> lot of the sleazier starports in the galaxy, doing this or that 
> repair job to make some cash, so maybe I'd be able to tell them 
> something they don't know.  Or maybe they just got off the wrong 
side 
> of the recharge bed."
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > Nightlight::
> > 
> > "Perhaps... they were looking for something... "replied Nightlight
> >
